patthana19.7:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in SN 45.)
patthana19.7:1.1_0: They don’t give rise to rapture.
patthana19.7:2.1_0: Perception is not a cause of bliss.
patthana19.7:3.1_0: equanimity doesn’t give rise to equanimity.
patthana19.7:3.1_1: Thoughts don’t give rise to rapture, and bliss born of immersion.
